name: Destroyer (Mind Games)
overview: The typical shoot-at-everything, in which the horizontal scroll inexorably advances, and if we touch something on the set, we die. To avoid the decoration, first we have to turn with the ship in the direction we want to move forward and then press forward to make it move, so you can already imagine what will happen to you, if you also have to worry about kill enemies... yes, you will not pass the first four or five obstacles.
